telecopyInformation.confidentialityNotice: This communication is considered privileged and intended to be private under the attorney-client doctrine. If the reader of this transmission is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone and return the original message to us via the U.S. Postal Service.
